name: test_4[编辑门店活动码]

steps.name: 点击导航栏渠道活码工具选项
点击导航栏活动码选项
点击导航栏门店活动码选项
切换编辑门店活动码页面
点击保存并生成活动码按钮
点击保存并生成活动码按钮

parameters.name: case
parameters.value: {'name': '编辑门店活动码(admin_driver)', 'steps': [(1, '点击导航栏渠道活码工具选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'渠道活码工具')]", None), (2, '点击导航栏活动码选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'活动码')]", None), (3, '点击导航栏门店活动码选项', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'门店活动码')]", None), (4, '切换门店活动码主页', 'iframe_enter', '//iframe[@src="/marketing/storeActivityCode/page"]', None), (5, '输入完整活动码名称', 'input', '//input[@placeholder="请输入"]', 'zdh测试正常创建门店活动码名称'), (6, '点击查询按钮', 'click', '//span[contains(text(),"查询")]', None), (7, '等待0.5s', 'sleep', 0.5, None), (8, '点击编辑按钮', 'click', '/html/body/div[1]/div/div/div/div/div[2]/div/div[2]/div/div/div[1]/div/div/div[4]/div[2]/table/tbody/tr/td[1]/div/div/span[2]', None), (9, '退出页面', 'iframe_exit', None, None), (10, '切换编辑门店活动码页面', 'iframe_enter', '//iframe[contains(@src,"/marketing/storeActivityCode/update")]', None), (11, '输入活动名称', 'input', "//label[contains(text(),'活动名称')]/../div/div[1]/input", 1), (12, '清空渠道名称输入框', 'clear', "//label[contains(text(),'选择渠道')]/../div/div/div[1]/div[1]/input", None), (13, '输入框输入渠道名称', 'input', "//label[contains(text(),'选择渠道')]/../div/div/div[1]/div[1]/input", '上海 / 浦东 / 来福士门店'), (14, '选择渠道', 'click', "//span[contains(text(),'上海 / 浦东 / 来福士门店')]", 'force=True'), (15, '点击用户标签输入框', 'click', '/html/body/div/div/div/div/div/form/div[6]/div/div/div[1]/div/input', None), (16, '删除已有标签', 'delete', '/html/body/div/div/div/div/div/form/div[6]/div/div/div[1]/div/input', None), (17, '输入用户标签', 'input', '/html/body/div/div/div/div/div/form/div[6]/div/div/div[1]/div/input', '25-30万'), (18, '选择用户标签', 'click', "//li[contains(text(),'25-30万')]", None), (19, '输入文本欢迎语', 'input', "//textarea[@maxlength = '1000']", 1), (20, '点击保存并生成活动码按钮', 'click', '//span[contains(text(),"保存并生成活码")]', None), (21, '点击保存并生成活动码按钮', 'click', '//span[contains(text(),"保存并生成活码")]', None), (22, '退出页面', 'iframe_exit', None, None), (23, '断言提示消息', 'assert_text', '//div[@class="ivu-notice-title"]', '编辑成功')]}
